message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet halfway at $13,000? This product is truly top-of-the-line and will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $13,000. Would you be willing to consider $11,500?

Bob, I'm seeing your commitment to this negotiation, and I want to find a solution.  My final offer is $12,500. This represents a significant discount from my original asking price and reflects my desire to see this product in your capable hands.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
